## TestVault class

A pre-configured vault for consumer test workflows.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class TestVault 
```

## Remarks

`TestVault` wraps a real `VaultKeeper` instance backed by an [InMemoryBackend](./test-helpers.inmemorybackend.md)<!-- -->. It skips doctor checks and uses dev-mode identity, making it suitable for fast, hermetic tests.

## Example


```ts
const vault = await TestVault.create()
await vault.backend.store('my-secret', 'hunter2')
const jwe = await vault.keeper.setup('my-secret')
const { token } = await vault.keeper.authorize(jwe)
```
